UFC

stats visualizer

welcome to the UFC stats visualizer.

this visualizer utilizes SportRadar's UFC API to obtain the current top ten rankings of each division

in addition, a custom webscraper obtains athlete data from the official UFC website


* webscraper speed can vary depending on internet latency and traffic on the UFC's website *

your patience is greatly appreciated!


select a weight class from the dropdown above

loading symbol will appear as webscraper retrieves data

click on a card to flip it over

hover over each chart for indepth info
